name: All in Your Mind
description:
You should be getting a good night's sleep, but  unfortunately you played one of your older brother's scary games, and now you can't get the monsters from that game out of your head. However, there is one way to banish these monsters: collect 10 black hearts. That will destroy them and allow you to finally go to bed.

Tutorial:

The Monster that is Hidden

You can't see it, but you sure can hear it. To make sure it can't sense you, turn off the light the moment you hear a sound, and don't turn it back on until you hear footsteps!

The Monster in the Dark

This smiling fiend pierces through the darkness with its ever grinning face. Put your flashlight on it before it fully smiles and it will disappear, waiting for a new place to come back.

The Monster Around the Corner

It will slowly peek out from above you, and if shine it with your flashlight, it will only come down faster! Make sure that once it has fully emerged, you are not looking at it!
